summary: Selected works of H.P. Lovecraft, now in Skyrim! Most of these can be found on the shelf in Farengar\'s room in Dragonsreach, directly to your left as you enter the room. I\'ve also placed a chest to the right of that shelf with all of the books for easier access/placement. Additionally, these can now be bought from the mechants listed below , but
descriptionHtml:
Selected works of H.P. Lovecraft, now in Skyrim! Most of these can be found on the shelf in Farengar\'s room in Dragonsreach, directly to your left as you enter the room. I\'ve also placed a chest to the right of that shelf with all of the books for easier access/placement. Additionally, these can now be bought from the mechants listed below , but will always be collected at Farengar\'s for easy reference.
 
Currently 34 books, but more to come. If you have a favorite, let me know in the comments and I\'ll try to add it. Please rate above if you like this mod, or if you don\'t like it too. Thanks

Current Merchant List:
Farengar in Dragonsreach
Urag in Winterhold College\'s Arcanaeum 
Calcelmo in Markarth\'s Understone Keep
Sybille Stentor in The Blue Palace in Solitude
Wuunferth the Unliving in Windhelm\'s Palace of the Kings
Madena in Dawnstar\'s The White Hall
Wylandriah in Riften\'s Mistveil Keep (new)
Falion in Morthal (new) 
Lucan and Camilla Valerius in the Riverwood Trader (new)


Current book list:

The Call of Cthulhu
The Outsider
Dagon
At the Mountains of Madness (per request)
The Shadow Out of Time (per request)
The Beast in the Cave
The Lurking Fear
The Thing on the Doorstep
The Shadow Over Innsmouth
The Colour Out of Space
Ex Oblivione
The Music of Erich Zann
The Dunwich Horror (per request)
The Cats of Ulthar (per request)
The Alchemist (per request)
Celepha√Øs (per request)
The Rats in the Walls (per request)
The Dream-Quest of Unknown Kadath(per request)
Cool Air (per request)
Pickman\'s Model (per request)
Herbert West - Reanimator (per request)
The Statement of Randolph Carter (per request)
The Other Gods
The Unnamable
Nyarlathotep
Beyond the Wall of Sleep
The Doom That Came to Sarnath
The Horror at Red Hook
Facts Concerning the Late Arthur Jermyn and His Family (per request)
Polaris
Hypnos (per request)
The Dreams in the Witch House (per request)
Through The Gates Of The Silver Key (per request)
The Book


Source: hplovecraft.com
